title: Short-term Intensive Course on Enhancing Clinical Competency through Anesthesiology Simulation-Based Training

context.prior_knowledge: Basic anesthesiology clinical knowledge and fundamental patient care skills
context.additional_context: Online simulation education environment for current professionals, with digital devices provided and asynchronous learning conducted through an LMS platform, featuring a formative assessment-centered feedback system

learning_goals: Learners perform emergency response protocols for anesthesia-related critical situations with over 80% accuracy via simulation-based scenarios.
Learners achieve a score of 4 or higher on a rubric measuring team-based non-technical skills (communication, leadership) in a simulated environment.
Learners achieve a knowledge retention rate of over 90% in an LMS-based assessment quiz within 24 hours of simulation learning.

resources: Virtual Digital Sphygmomanometer/Blood Pressure Monitor Equipment

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
